alert.note: Alert for Catahoula; Concordia (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 13 at 5:58PM CDT until April 13 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Concordia Parish in northeastern Louisiana... Catahoula Parish in northeastern Louisiana... * Until 645 PM CDT. * At 557 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Aimwell to near Libuse, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Aimwell and Manifest around 600 PM CDT. Wallace Ridge around 605 PM CDT. Larto, Clayton and Lee Bayou around 625 PM CDT. New Era and Mayna around 630 PM CDT. Monterey around 640 PM CDT. Deer Park around 645 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Harrisonburg and Ridgecrest. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for northeastern Louisiana...and southwestern Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
